metadata.dc:title: World Bank WDI Visualization
metadata.dc:creator: Craig N Lincoln (https://orcid.org/0000-0003-3239-0114)
metadata.dc:subject: Interactive visualoization to explore correlations between World Bank - World Development Indicators (WDI)
metadata.dc:description: An interactive visualization tool that allows users to explore the WDI dataset with afocus on finding correlations between pairs of indicators.
metadata.dc:source: World Bank Group. (2020). World Bank World Development Indicators, 1960-2019. [data collection]. 27th Edition. UK Data Service. SN: 4814, http://doi.org/10.5257/wb/wdi/2019Q4
